name: comp.
description: It's a computer! A picture from a series of collages, on the theme of "Intentional deficit" how to make a deficit on purpose - 1. You need to reduce the number of available colors, these frames can give more space for thought (for example, I used several jars of gouache, it is cheap, affordable and I don't mind it) 2 You can choose a simpler material, in my case, this is paper from school booklets on mathematics or something like this waste paper (I painted sheets for my needs for collages) 3. PVA glue. it's cheap and affordable too. all this allows you to do an infinite number of things, if only you have enough strength. And the idea of ​​a computer is simple, here everything is obvious, this is mine and most likely yours, too, the first computer in my life (unless of course you are younger than me), such is the presentation of the novelty of that time, with all the networks, cables and cunning of such a device.
